quests.title: Wayfarer's Welcome
quests.description: You begin at the Pond. Make your way to Lynthaven and introduce yourself to Holger the Blacksmith to learn the ropes.

quests.title: Settling In
quests.description: After arriving in Lynthaven, you're told to meet Elder Myla, who oversees newcomers. She wishes to speak with you about the land and its people.

quests.title: Resources of the Plains
quests.description: Elder Myla asks you to gather a sampling of natural resources before visiting Holger. She says it's good to learn what's available in the wild.

quests.title: Forging Foundations
quests.description: Holger wants you to gather 40 mineable materials from around Lynthaven. This will help you unlock the Mining Collection 1 and understand how crafting works.

quests.title: Journey to Emberveil
quests.description: Elder Myla suggests you explore Emberveil, a larger settlement to the east. It's a good opportunity to familiarize yourself with the area and its inhabitants.

quests.title: The Emberveil Ranger
quests.description: Locals in the Meadow mention a retired ranger living in Emberveil who teaches combat. Perhaps he can show you the ropes.

quests.title: First Cast
quests.description: A friendly fisher at the Pond offers you a simple task: catch 5 fish to learn the basics of fishing.

quests.title: Wood for the Road
quests.description: A villager in Lynthaven asks for some oak for repairs. A simple task that teaches the basics of foraging.

quests.title: A Farmerâ€™s Favor
quests.description: A local farmer asks for a bit of wheat or carrots. A good way to learn farming fundamentals.
